name: @minitim222/harvard-mit-course-recommendation
description: Discover and search Harvard's course catalog by code, title, or instructor. Explore random course picks to spark inspiration and uncover new subjects. View detailed course info and catalog insights to plan your schedule.

tools.name: search_courses
tools.title: Search Harvard Courses
tools.description: Search the Harvard course catalog. Searches course codes, titles, and instructor names. Returns all matching courses.

tools.name: random_courses
tools.title: Get Random Courses
tools.description: Get a random selection of courses from the catalog. Useful for exploration.

tools.name: get_course_details
tools.title: Get Course Details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific course using its class key

tools.name: catalog_stats
tools.title: Get Catalog Statistics
tools.description: Get statistics about the Harvard course catalog (total courses, instructors, etc.)
